src_original: tatrāvasthāḥ trayaḥ -- hetvavasthā nāma bodhicittāt prabhṛti bodhimaṇḍanivedanaṃ yāvat |
sattvārthakriyāvasthā nāma prathamadharmmacakrapravarttanāt prabhṛti āśāsanāntardhānaṃ yāvat |
tgt_original: sattvārthakriyāvasthā nāma  prathamadharmacakrapravartanāt prabhṛti āśāsanāntardhānaṃ yāvat |

src_original: tatra prayogo dvidhā |  adhimukticittasya pāramitāḥ sapta |
tgt_original: tatra prayogāvasthā dvividhā- adhimukticittasya  adhimukticaritasya  pāramitā daśa |
bhūmiprāptasya catasṛbhiḥ sampadbhiḥ sampannaṃ cittamiti  tadarthaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīyaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāya ityetāḥ sapta pāramitāḥ  | adhimukticaryācaritasya daśa pāramitāḥ -

src_original: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryyaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā |  praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānaṃ matāḥ pāramitā daśa ||
tgt_original: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā|  praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānaṃ matāḥ pāramitā daśa ||iti |
